name: Expense
description:
Expense is a first-person adventure/escape room game about intuition, strategy and exploration, with simple controls and hand-made animations that surround and immerse the player. Puzzle your way through carefully or try your luck with random chance, but always remember to follow your pendulum.

Controls:
Tab to think / leave console
WASD to move / navigate within console
Space to jump / press console button
Ctrl+0 to reset all progress

In Expense you can expect to:
  • Traverse a procedurally generated maze with new challenges behind every door
  • Use movement controls to bet on and compete against AI opponents in games of prediction and luck
  • Play minigames at in-game consoles to progress towards your final destination, unlocking clues and lore along the way
  • Take risks and learn through trial and error, guided only by the voice in your head when you close your eyes and think...
